definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: The total diameter of cavitation, if present, is less than 4cm.
sentences.chinese: 若出现空洞，其直径总和小于4厘米。

sentences.english: Wall Street gains after a smaller-than-expected number of jobs lost and a surprise drop in the unemployment rate.
sentences.chinese: 小于预期的失业数和失业率的神奇下跌使美股上涨。

sentences.english: So that efficiency is something less than one, and we'd like to figure out what that is.
sentences.chinese: 因此效率肯定小于一，接下来解释这是为什么。

sentences.english: Check first is N less than 2.
The use of fishing nets with mesh smaller than the specified minimum size is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用小于最小网目尺寸的网具进行捕捞。

sentences.english: The gyro ball is too low. The height of sinking test is below 6mm.
sentences.chinese: 陀螺球太低，下沉实验高度小于6毫米。

sentences.english: Output line voltage of the error of the absolute value of less than 1% to the indicator.
sentences.chinese: 输出线电压的误差绝对值小于1%，达到指标要求。

sentences.english: When the height of storey is not higher than 4M, Fixed parts can be installed on riser.
sentences.chinese: 楼层高度小于或等于4M时，立管可装一个固定件。

sentences.english: The wind erosion modulus in artificial pasture was less than that in cropland.
sentences.chinese: 人工草地的风蚀模数小于农田，生态效益优于农田。

sentences.english: Ben- ding strength of ice sheet is far less than its crushing strength.
sentences.chinese: 冰的挠曲强度远小于其挤压强度。

sentences.english: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified decimal number.
sentences.chinese: 传回小于或等于指定的十进位数字的最大整数。

sentences.english: The day range inside of the forest is smaller than outside, and the light variety is more even slow.
sentences.chinese: 日较差林内小于林外，林内光照变化比较平缓。

sentences.english: And, if this quantity is less than zero, the bonding is favorable.
sentences.chinese: 如果这个数小于，能够形成键。

sentences.english: B. For hard and half hard drawn tubes the ratio of outer diameter to wall thickness is no more than 25.
sentences.chinese: 硬态和半硬态拉制管外径与壁厚之比不小于25者。

sentences.english: The Spanish collator used the less-than sign.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙语排序器使用了小于号。

sentences.english: On the one hand, the children who are below ten years old can't be the spokespersons.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，小于十岁的孩子不能成为代言人。

definition: to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
